title: Shop 16
creator_credit: Shawn Reece, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Shawn Reece had no confidence and stayed at home when he wasn’t at school. That is, until his friend convinced him to come along to Shop 16, a youth centre run by the Salvation Army in Reservoir.
creator_credit_for_label: Shawn Reece, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
